trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable list of hierarchical data source names.
trans-unit.target: 创建用户可选择层次结构数据源名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter 类是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>通常由引用的对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: All members except the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method are inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 所有成员都除外<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataSourceIDConverter>继承方法</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method indicates whether the specified component implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法指示指定的组件是否实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter>类引用类时<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataSourceIDConverter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified component is a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定的组件是否有效的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The IsValidDataSource method considers `component` a valid data source if it implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: IsValidDataSource 方法考虑`component`如果它实现的有效数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>

trans-unit.source: if component is a valid data source; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 component 是有效的数据源; 否则为 。
